mapper.select: select id, uid, join_uid, start_time, expired_time, status, del_flg, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_join_share_activity_record where id = #{id}
select id, uid, join_uid, start_time, expired_time, status, del_flg, create_time, update_time, tenant_id from t_join_share_activity_record limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_join_share_activity_record(uid, join_uid, start_time, expired_time, status, del_flg, create_time, update_time, tenant_id) values (#{uid}, #{joinUid}, #{startTime}, #{expiredTime}, #{status}, #{delFlg}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{tenantId})
mapper.update:
update t_join_share_activity_record
uid = #{uid},
join_uid = #{joinUid},
start_time = #{startTime},
expired_time = #{expiredTime},
status = #{status},
del_flg = #{delFlg},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
where id = #{id}
